content: @John Moehrke good to see an IHE track. Can you comment on the relationship between IUA and Smart app Launch? (also, can you invite Steve Moore here please)
I'm way behind on my Zulip reading, but I've just invited Steve to join.
Reaching out from the Clinical Research track, we should try and meet and share notes!
Is there interest in participating in an IHE-on-FHIR or XDS-on-FHIR (aka MHD) track at the upcoming FHIR Connectathon? I am happy to host, but want to understand who is interested.
